title: Understanding Form Controls
text: Form controls are elements that you can add to a worksheet to make it more interactive and user-friendly. They are often used in forms and dashboards.

title: Purpose of Form Controls
text: Think about how form controls can help users who are not familiar with Excel. What do they provide to make the interface easier to use?

hintAnswer: to ensure consistent data entry but also to make the final interface one that someone unfamiliar with Excel will be able to use easily
title: Key Benefits of Form Controls
text: Form controls are used to ensure consistent data entry and to make the final interface one that someone unfamiliar with Excel will be able to use easily.
choices: to ensure consistent data entry but also to make the final interface one that someone unfamiliar with Excel will be able to use easily
to make the final interface one that someone unfamiliar with Excel will be able to use easily
